pageSubtitle: A curated collection of digital experiences crafted with precision, depth, and fluid interaction.
startProjectSub: Ready to bring your vision to life?
comingSoon: This portfolio page is coming soon.

p1.title: Digital Ecosystem
p1.description: Comprehensive solution for modern high-growth startups.
p1.longDescription: A full-stack digital platform that unifies customer engagement, analytics, and operations into a single, fluid interface. Built for scale-ups demanding clarity at speed.
p1.challenge: The client needed to consolidate 12 separate tools into one cohesive platform without sacrificing the specialized functionality of each.
p1.solution: We architected a modular micro-frontend system with real-time data syncing, wrapped in an organic UI that makes complex workflows feel effortless.
p1.impact: Reduced operational overhead by 60% and increased team velocity by 3x within the first quarter of deployment.

p2.title: Liquid Dashboard
p2.description: Data analytics with deep immersive exploration.
p2.longDescription: An analytics dashboard that transforms raw data into flowing, interactive visualizations. Users navigate datasets like explorers charting new territory.
p2.challenge: Traditional dashboards overwhelmed users with static charts and tables. The client wanted data exploration to feel intuitive and engaging.
p2.solution: We designed fluid, gesture-driven data visualizations with adaptive layouts that respond to user behavior and surface insights proactively.
p2.impact: User engagement with analytics increased by 240%, and the average time-to-insight dropped from 15 minutes to under 3.

p3.title: Glassic Mobile
p3.description: Defining the next generation of mobile interfaces.
p3.longDescription: A mobile-first experience that pushes the boundaries of what native apps can feel like. Depth, transparency, and motion come together to create an interface that breathes.
p3.challenge: The existing app felt dated and clunky. Users were churning at onboarding because the interface was too complex for casual use.
p3.solution: We rebuilt the entire UX with a glass-morphism design system, haptic feedback patterns, and progressive disclosure to simplify without dumbing down.
p3.impact: App Store rating jumped from 3.2 to 4.9 stars, and onboarding completion rates increased by 85%.

p4.title: Quantum Web
p4.description: Blurring the lines between reality and interface.
p4.longDescription: An experimental web platform that uses advanced animations and spatial design to create experiences that feel three-dimensional on a 2D screen.
p4.challenge: The brand needed a digital presence that felt as premium and immersive as their physical retail spaces, but accessible to anyone with a browser.
p4.solution: We leveraged WebGL, scroll-driven animations, and custom shaders to create a spatial web experience that responds to device orientation and user proximity.
p4.impact: Brand engagement increased by 200%, average session duration tripled, and the site won 3 Awwwards Site of the Day honors.

p5.title: Neural Flow
p5.description: AI-powered workflow automation for creative teams.
p5.longDescription: An intelligent platform that learns from creative team behaviors and automates repetitive handoffs, reviews, and asset management — letting designers focus on what matters.
p5.challenge: Creative agencies were losing 30% of billable hours to project management overhead, file versioning conflicts, and approval bottlenecks.
p5.solution: We built an AI layer that predicts task dependencies, auto-routes approvals, and manages asset versions with visual diff — all with a fluid, distraction-free interface.
p5.impact: Teams recovered an average of 12 hours per week per designer, and project delivery timelines shortened by 40%.

p6.title: Prism Commerce
p6.description: Next-gen e-commerce with immersive product exploration.
p6.longDescription: A headless commerce platform where products come alive through 3D previews, AR try-on, and adaptive storefronts that personalize in real-time based on browsing behavior.
p6.challenge: Online conversion rates plateaued at 2.1%. Customers couldn't get the tactile confidence needed to purchase premium products without seeing them in person.
p6.solution: We integrated WebXR product previews, real-time personalization, and a one-tap checkout flow that reduces friction at every step of the funnel.
p6.impact: Conversion rates jumped to 5.8%, average order value increased by 35%, and return rates dropped by half.
